00027 /* Define to prevent recursive inclusion -------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00028 #ifndef __HT32_BOARD_CONFIG_H
00029 #define __HT32_BOARD_CONFIG_H
00030 
00031 #ifdef __cplusplus
00032  extern "C" {
00033 #endif
00034 
00035 /* Settings ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00036 #if defined(USE_HT32F50343_SK)
00037   #define HTCFG_SLED                               (HT_SLED1)
00038   #define HTCFG_SLED_CLK(ck)                       (ck.Bit.SLED1)
00039   #define HTCFG_SLED_GPIO_ID                       (GPIO_PA)
00040   #define HTCFG_SLED_AFIO_PIN                      (AFIO_PIN_0)
00041   #define HTCFG_SLED_CK_PRESCALER                  (3)       /* F_PCLK/HTCFG_SLED_CK_PRESCALER     = 20 MHz */
00042   #define HTCFG_SLED_BAUDRATE                      (25)      /* F_SCLK/HTCFG_SLED_BAUDRATE         = 800 kHz*/
00043   #define HTCFG_SLED_T0H                           (5)       /* 5/25 = 20% Duty. 1/800K * (5/25)   = 0.25 us*/
00044   #define HTCFG_SLED_TH1                           (20)      /* 20/25 = 80% Duty. 1/800K * (20/25) = 1.00 us*/
00045   #define HTCFG_SLED_PDMA_RAM_TO_DR_CH             (PDMA_CH1)
00046   #define HTCFG_SLED_PDMA_RAM_TO_RAM_CH            (PDMA_CH2)
00047 #endif
00048 
00049 #ifdef __cplusplus
00050 }
00051 #endif
00052 
00053 #endif
